employment.heading: Dotothy Tours
employment.about: Worked as a booking assistant but also had independent tasks which involved contacts with various suppliers, hotels and guides. I enjoyed the fast pace, the international atmosphere and being able to give customers really good service.

employment.heading: Vapiano Norway and Sweden
employment.about: I took orders from customers in a show kitchen where I prepared the food in front of them, kept the stations clean and filled up with goods, etc. I also got to work as a hostess where I stood at the checkout, kept the restaurant clean and welcomed guests and explained Vapiano's special concept.

employment.heading: Asperud Barnehage
employment.about: I did all the practical and administrative things that are required of a pre-school teacher, such as learning logs, parent meetings, etc.

employment.heading: Pysslingen förskolor AB
employment.about: I did all the practical and administrative things that are required of a pre-school teacher, such as learning logs, parent meetings, etc.

about me: My name is Sophie Nordell and I am 30 years old. I would describe myself as an outgoing, positive and structured person.
I have always been interested in a career in IT but never dared to take the plunge until now.
In my spare time I spend most of my time with my family. I like to read, play videogames and hang out with friends.
